Actions.Name: Approve enrollment request
Actions.Description: This action will approve the training enrollment request

Actions.Name: Cancel enrollment
Actions.Description: This action will cancel the training enrollment

Actions.Name: Set enrollment status to completed
Actions.Description: This action will change the enrollment status to completed for the related training

Actions.Name: When a learner has completed training
Actions.Description: This operation is triggered when a learner has completed assigned training

Actions.Name: When training has been created
Actions.Description: This operation is triggered when a course or training plan has been created

Actions.Name: When training has been deleted from a catalog
Actions.Description: This operation is triggered when a course or training plan has been deleted from a catalog

Actions.Name: When a learner has enrolled into training
Actions.Description: This operation is triggered when a learner has enrolled into training

Actions.Name: When training has been published to a catalog
Actions.Description: This operation is triggered when a course or training plan has been published to a catalog

Actions.Name: When a learner has started any of the course activities
Actions.Description: This operation is triggered when a learner has started any of the course activities

Actions.Name: When a learner has unenrolled from training
Actions.Description: This operation is triggered when a learner has unenrolled from assigned training

Actions.Name: When training has been unpublished from a catalog
Actions.Description: This operation is triggered when a course or training plan has been unpublished from a catalog

Actions.Name: Create training course
Actions.Description: This action will create a new course

Actions.Name: Create course category
Actions.Description: This action will create a new course category

Actions.Name: Create course session
Actions.Description: This action will create a new course session

Actions.Name: Create course tag
Actions.Description: This action will create a new course tag

Actions.Name: When a learner has requested approval for training
Actions.Description: This operation is triggered when a learner enrolls into training configured for External Approval Flow

Actions.Name: Enroll user to training
Actions.Description: This action will enroll user to training object by user login name and course id

Actions.Name: Upload File
Actions.Description: Uploads and create a file in LMS365 cloud storage.

Actions.Name: Get course categories
Actions.Description: This action will get all course categories

Actions.Name: Get course details
Actions.Description: This action will provide all available information about selected course and related catalog

Actions.Name: Get course provisioning status
Actions.Description: This action will get course provisioning status

Actions.Name: Get all courses from related course catalog
Actions.Description: This action will retrieve all courses from related course catalog

Actions.Name: Get course tags
Actions.Description: This action will get all course tags

Actions.Name: Get enrollment info
Actions.Description: This action will get enrollment info

Actions.Name: Get users
Actions.Description: This action will get list of user

Actions.Name: Send an HTTP request
Actions.Description: Construct a REST API request to invoke.

Actions.Name: Send an HTTP request (Preview)
Actions.Description: Construct a REST API request to invoke.

Actions.Name: Reject enrollment request
Actions.Description: This action will reject the training enrollment request

Actions.Name: Force user to retake training
Actions.Description: This action will force the user to retake the related training

Actions.Name: When a user has been created
Actions.Description: This operation is triggered when a user entity has been enabled/created in LMS365

Actions.Name: When a user has been deleted
Actions.Description: This operation is triggered when a user entity has been disabled/deleted from LMS365
